faq1_q: How much does a NAATI translation cost? What is the turnaround time?
faq1_p1: The quote and turnaround time depend on the number of pages, the document format and the complexity of the content.
faq1_p2: In general, one-page documents are delivered within 24 hours after payment confirmation. Longer documents are usually delivered within 2 to 4 business days.
faq1_p3: A 15% surcharge applies for urgent documents.
faq2_p1: Jobs are confirmed with 100% payment. We’ll share bank details or alternatives if you don’t have an Australian account.
faq3_p1: Translations are delivered by email with a digital stamp, unless a printed version is requested.
faq3_p2: Digital NAATI translations are just as valid as ink-stamped translations.
faq4_p1: NAATI is Australia’s national standards and certification authority for translators and interpreters. NAATI translations do not expire.

svc1_p: Accurate, specialised translations of technical and scientific documents.
svc2_p: Official NAATI-certified translations for migration, education and employment purposes.
svc3_p: Professional certified interpreting services for official and communication settings.
svc4_p: Accurate conversion of audiovisual content into clear, structured text.

feat1_p: From the first contact, you’ll speak with a professional who adapts to your needs, answers your questions and helps you achieve your goals. We understand that behind a translation there may be hope for business growth, a new job opportunity or the chance to move to a new country. We know what that means and we want to support you.
feat2_p: When we work with important documents, accuracy is essential. That’s why our translations are handled by professionals specialising in health, migration, education, e-learning, environmental topics and agriculture, among others. We use the appropriate terminology and follow each industry’s standards so your translations are accepted by the relevant authorities.
feat3_p: We know that when launching a product, applying for a visa or winning a client abroad, time is valuable. That’s why we provide clear, convenient turnaround times so you can plan without delays. Your documents are safe: we follow NAATI and AUSIT codes of ethics to ensure confidentiality in every translation.
srv1_p: We work across a range of industries and help businesses expand, reach more clients and meet quality standards and cultural expectations in each country. We build translation memories to ensure consistency and terminology databases to guarantee accuracy for every client.
srv2_p1: We provide NAATI-stamped translations for migration, study or work purposes in Australia. We work with legal translation experts to ensure accurate documents accepted by Australian authorities. Translations can be delivered digitally or with a physical stamp, depending on requirements. We want to help you achieve your goals!
srv2_li6: Reference letters, payslips and other work-related documents.
srv2_p2: We translate all kinds of documents. Feel free to contact us if your document isn’t on the list.
srv3_p: We provide a human review of texts produced using translation memories or machine translation tools. Does your brand image, the communication of important information or your visa application depend on a translation? Then it’s essential to ensure it has been reviewed by trained professionals. We’re here to help.
srv4_p: Coming soon: NAATI-certified interpreting services for meetings, conferences and events in Australia. Stay tuned for updates!
about_subtitle: I’m Lucía Giulietti, a technical and scientific English translator. I work with accuracy, confidentiality and a human approach in every project.
about_lead: I’m a technical and scientific English translator, graduated from IES en Lenguas Vivas “Juan Ramón Fernández”, one of Argentina’s most prestigious language institutes.
about_p1: Since 2021, I’ve helped clients around the world achieve their goals: publishing scientific research, translating health courses, expanding into foreign markets, promoting climate action, and more. I’ve been part of globally-reaching organisations and the International Federation of Translators’ translation team, which means I work under the highest industry standards.
about_p2: In 2023, I moved to Australia, where I travelled and immersed myself in the local culture. In 2024, with the goal of supporting people in their migration journeys, I obtained NAATI certification (English <> Spanish) and became a reliable ally for my clients. I follow NAATI and AUSIT codes of ethics to ensure the highest standards of quality, confidentiality and professionalism in every project.
about_highlight_title: What I enjoy most about translation
about_highlight_text: Creating a positive impact on people. Through a vaccine course translation, I can help promote health for thousands—especially in developing countries; with a NAATI translation, someone can achieve their dream of migrating; and with an English website, a business can expand internationally. I work with passion, commitment and professionalism in every project.
